name: filterable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Solids that are filterable can be removed from liquids or gases using special equipment: Of interest in this experiment are the filterable solids. The virus is present as a filterable agent transmitted through mothers' milk.
Information that is filterable can be selected or removed from something such as a computer file: The database is filterable by keyword. Click on the drop-down menu to view the filterable values.
More examplesFewer examplesThe filterable residue from waste water treatment plants was analyzed.The lists are filterable by age, nationality, and gender. The data is presented in filterable tables.
